meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7480.

td.p: Jeff Brown, a grant writer from Broken Arrow, Oklahoma
Trish Floyd, an actuary from Chicago, Illinois
Rob Liguori, a research editor from Brooklyn, New York (whose 3-day cash winnings total $58,601)

tr.td: THE DREADED SPELLING CATEGORY
A SONG OF "YOU"
PRESIDENTIAL HOMES
SOMETHING TO WEAR
AMERICAN AUTHORS
BEST DAY OF MY LIFE
